page.title: 02HOW I SPEND THE WEEKENDS
page.content: My name is Karla Graham and I live in Queens Park, Chester . This is a typical weekend of mine. I get up at 8:30am and make my breakfast. This is cereal,toast and coffee. Then I walk to the library. When I get back I play in our tree house ,before playing cricket with my brother.I then have lunch,salad and fruit.Then I go for a bike ride with my brother,Paul.When it gets dark,I come in and have tea. After,I watch T.V whilst ironing for my mother.I do my homework then go to bed at 9:30pm. On Sundays I do much the same except I go to church at 10:30am and my Grandfather comes for tea.
